name: rare-animals-auction-platform
description: منصة مزاد الحيوانات النادرة - منصة متكاملة ومتطورة لمزادات الحيوانات النادرة

scripts.kill-ports: bash -c 'for p in 5000 5173 5174 5175; do pid=$(lsof -t -i:$p || true); if [ -n "$pid" ]; then echo "Killing $pid on port $p"; kill -9 $pid || true; fi; done'
scripts.dev:frontend-safe: npm run kill-ports && cd auction-frontend && npm run dev
scripts.dev:admin-safe: npm run kill-ports && cd admin-dashboard && npm run dev
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.dev:all-safe: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend-safe" "npm run dev:admin-safe"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../auction-frontend && npm install && cd ../admin-dashboard && npm install && cd ../mobile-app && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin
scripts.test:all: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:admin
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../auction-frontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../admin-dashboard && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../mobile-app && rm -rf node_modules
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && echo 'Setup completed successfully!'
